title: health check api returns server status and timestamp
description: Verify that the GET /api/health endpoint returns a 200 status code with a JSON payload containing the server status as 'ok' and a valid ISO 8601 timestamp.

title: better auth authentication api handles signup login and session
description: Test the /api/auth/* endpoints for successful user signup, login, and session retrieval, including handling of valid and invalid credentials, and appropriate HTTP status codes (200, 400, 401).

title: protected route api enforces authentication and returns user info
description: Ensure that the GET /api/protected endpoint returns 200 with user information when a valid bearer token is provided, and returns 401 Unauthorized when no or invalid token is supplied.
